001package org.biopax.paxtools.pattern.constraint;
002
003import org.biopax.paxtools.controller.PathAccessor;
004import org.biopax.paxtools.model.BioPAXElement;
005import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.*;
006import org.biopax.paxtools.pattern.Match;
007
008import java.util.Collection;
009import java.util.HashSet;
010import java.util.Set;
011
012/**
013 * This constraint is used to collect related EntityReference of the controllers of a Control.
014 *
015 * Var0 - Control
016 * Var1 - ER of a controller PE
017 *
018 * @author Ozgun Babur
019 */
020public class ControlToControllerER extends ConstraintAdapter
021{
022        /**
023         * For navigating from Control to any PhysicalEntity controllers.
024         */
025        static final PathAccessor TO_CONTROLLER = new PathAccessor("Control/controller*:PhysicalEntity");
026
027        /**
028         * For getting ERs of PEs, also traversing generic-member relations.
029         */
030        static final PathAccessor TO_SUB_ERS = new PathAccessor(
031                "SimplePhysicalEntity/memberPhysicalEntity*:SimplePhysicalEntity/entityReference");
032
033        /**
034         * Constructor.
035         */
036        public ControlToControllerER()
037        {
038                super(2);
039        }
040
041        /**
042         * This is a generative constraint.
043         * @return true
044         */
045        @Override
046        public boolean canGenerate()
047        {
048                return true;
049        }
050
051        /**
052         * Navigates to the related ERs of the controllers of the given Control.
053         * @param match current pattern match
054         * @param ind mapped indices
055         * @return related ERs
056         */
057        @Override
058        public Collection<BioPAXElement> generate(Match match, int... ind)
059        {
060                Control ctrl = (Control) match.get(ind[0]);
061                return new HashSet<BioPAXElement>(getRelatedERs(ctrl));
062        }
063
064        public Set<EntityReference> getRelatedERs(Control ctrl)
065        {
066                Set<EntityReference> ers = new HashSet<EntityReference>();
067
068                for (Object o : TO_CONTROLLER.getValueFromBean(ctrl))
069                {
070                        if (o instanceof PhysicalEntity) ers.addAll(getRelatedERs((PhysicalEntity) o));
071                }
072
073                return ers;
074        }
075
076        public Set<EntityReference> getRelatedERs(PhysicalEntity pe)
077        {
078                Set<EntityReference> ers = new HashSet<EntityReference>();
079
080                if (pe instanceof Complex)
081                {
082                        ers.addAll(((Complex) pe).getMemberReferences());
083                }
084                else if (pe instanceof SimplePhysicalEntity)
085                {
086                        EntityReference er = ((SimplePhysicalEntity) pe).getEntityReference();
087                        if (er != null) ers.add(er);
088
089                        for (Object o : TO_SUB_ERS.getValueFromBean(pe))
090                        {
091                                if (o instanceof EntityReference) ers.add((EntityReference) o);
092                        }
093                }
094
095                return ers;
096        }
097}
